alert.note: Alert for Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 6:52PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Owyhee County through 745 PM MDT... At 651 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crab Spring Butte, or 44 miles north of Owyhee, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... The Hat around 700 PM MDT. Big Horse Basin Gap and Chalk Hills around 730 PM MDT. Bruneau, Hot Spring, Bruneau Canyon Viewpoint and C J Strike Reservoir around 740 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
